title.value: The clinical value of Aspergillus-specific IgG antibody test in the diagnosis of nonneutropenic invasive pulmonary aspergillosis
title.justification: The title of the paper is provided at the beginning of the article.
title.quote: The clinical value of Aspergillus-specific IgG antibody test in the diagnosis of nonneutropenic invasive pulmonary aspergillosis

extractions.description: This study evaluates the clinical value of Aspergillus-specific IgG antibody tests in diagnosing nonneutropenic invasive pulmonary aspergillosis, highlighting the test's sensitivity and specificity compared to other methods like serum galactomannan and bronchoalveolar lavage fluid galactomannan.

type.justification: The study is empirical as it involves gathering data and performing a comparative analysis using tests such as enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay and galactomannan assays on a sample population.
type.quote: Aspergillus-specific IgG antibody (Asp IgG) has been successfully applied in the diagnosis... We explored its value... by a multicenter, prospective, and controlled study.

name.justification: The study is focused on the clinical microbiology aspects of diagnosing invasive pulmonary aspergillosis.
name.quote: Aspergillus-specific IgG antibody (Asp IgG) has been successfully applied in the diagnosis of chronic pulmonary aspergillosis.

name.justification: The study heavily deals with immune response tests (Aspergillus-specific IgG antibody).
name.quote: The Aspergillus-specific IgG antibody (Asp IgG) is proven to be a valuable test for the diagnosis...

name.justification: SPSS is explicitly mentioned as the software used for analyzing the data.
name.quote: SPSS 26.0 software was used to analyze the data...
